description: Easy to make and oh-so fruity, these no-bake bars are great snacks for kids and adults. Make them in batches to easily grab when you're on the go.
keywords: Slice,Pescatarian,Low salt,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Back to school,Sesame free,Budget,Stone fruit,Strawberry,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: No-Cook Strawberry Bars Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a 16 x 26cm rectangular baking tray with baking paper.
Place strawberries, vanilla, cinnamon and apricots in a blender and pulse until smooth.
Transfer mixture to a large bowl and add oats, 3/4 cup coconut and chia seeds, then stir to combine.
Pour mixture into tray and press down firmly using back of a spoon. Press in remaining coconut.
Freeze for 1 hour or until firm. Using a sharp knife, cut into 12 equal portions. Store in fridge until ready to serve.
